rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.vastu_notes: The entrance should face north or east for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.vastu_notes: Place the seating area to face east for auspicious energy. Use light colors and natural decor.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.vastu_notes: Positioned on the south-east corner as per Vastu to enhance positivity.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Studio Space
rooms.description: Serves both as a studio and workspace. Features ample natural light with south-facing windows.
rooms.vastu_notes: Ensure that the window placement allows balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.vastu_notes: Place in the north-west corner to avoid direct alignment with the main entrance.

rooms.name: Private Gymnasium
rooms.description: Dedicated space for fitness equipment and exercise routines.
rooms.vastu_notes: Ensure good ventilation and natural light; ideally positioned in the north-west or east side.
